name: De Pandapunten van Xi Jinping
description:
This game contains references to sex and violence, and contains political topics.
A game made for the Banned In China game jam.
Use the mouse to play the game.
Game language is English. 

Known Issues:
-It is possible to get soft-locked in the two tutorial levels
-The game has no sound, and really should have sound
-Credit scroll does not reset correctly
